The four dates and venues have been confirmed as follows:

* December 27 - Teatria - Oulu, Finland
* December 29 - Kaapelitehdas - Helsinki, Finland
* December 30 - Metroauto Areena - Tampere, Finland
* December 31 - Jäähalli - Mikkeli, Finland

The gigs in Oulu and Mikkeli will feature Tuple Salminen of Tarot filling the role of lead vocals, while the Helsinki and Tampere concerts will feature original singer Pasi Rantanen, who is leaving the band, for the last time.;1;1;"http://en.wikinews.org/wiki/Thunderstone_to_support_Sonata_Arctica_on_Christmas_tour_of_Finland#ev15"
